A student decides to investigate the effect on \(R_{\mathrm{p}}\) of changing the current \(I_{1}\), using a variable resistor (rheostat).

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[153, 622, 875, 658]]<|/det|>
In the space below, copy the diagram shown in Fig. 3.2, but with the addition of a variable resistor connected in the circuit at a suitable position for the investigation.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[846, 897, 875, 915]]<|/det|>
<mark>[2]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[77, 72, 94, 91]]<|/det|> <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[116, 72, 636, 92]]<|/det|> In this experiment, you will determine the focal length of a lens. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[116, 103, 576, 123]]<|/det|> Carry out the following instructions, referring to Fig. 4.1. <|ref|>image<|/ref|><|det|>[[151, 131, 888, 255]]<|/det|> <|ref|>image_caption<|/ref|><|det|>[[463, 273, 532, 292]]<|/det|> <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[116, 304, 146, 323]]<|/det|> <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 304, 875, 339]]<|/det|> Place the lens a distance \(u = 30.0 \text{cm}\) from the illuminated object. Move the screen until a sharply focused image of the object is seen on the screen. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[153, 344, 180, 363]]<|/det|> <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[193, 344, 875, 378]]<|/det|> Measure, and record in Table 4.1, the distance \(\nu\) between the centre of the lens and the screen. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[148, 384, 180, 403]]<|/det|> <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[193, 384, 566, 403]]<|/det|> Calculate \(uv\) and enter the value in the table. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[144, 409, 178, 428]]<|/det|> <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[193, 409, 875, 443]]<|/det|> Measure, and record in the table, the distance \(d\) between the illuminated object and the screen. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[114, 456, 144, 475]]<|/det|> <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[153, 456, 818, 475]]<|/det|> Repeat the steps in (a) using \(u\) values of \(45.0 \text{cm}, 50.0 \text{cm}, 55.0 \text{cm}\) and \(60.0 \text{cm}\). <|ref|>table_caption<|/ref|><|det|>[[457, 486, 539, 505]]<|/det|> Table 4.1 <|ref|>table<|/ref|><|det|>[[247, 520, 751, 725]]<|/det|>
\(u/ \text{cm}\)\(v/ \text{cm}\)\(uv/ \text{cm}^2\)\(d/ \text{cm}\)
30.0
45.0
50.0
55.0
60.0
<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[848, 720, 875, 739]]<|/det|> [2]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[114, 72, 146, 91]]<|/det|>
<label>(c)</label>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 72, 808, 109]]<|/det|>
